description:
PirateBox
A self-contained mobile communication and file sharing device

Short description about what PirateBox is and what the targets are. http://daviddarts.com/piratebox/

I'm going to talk about:

    Where are the origins of "PirateBox"

    What a PirateBox is.

    Forks and use cases

    Which kind of hardware is used.

    What's next?

    Life demo of PirateBox.

Download video: http://videos.fscons.org/fscons/2013/lilla_horsalen_-_2013-11-10_1000_-_piratebox_-_matthias_strubel_-_7.ogv

title: Matthias Strubel: PirateBox
